short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install Thunderstore mods to your server hosted on ValheimServerHosting.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install any supported mod on Valheim Thunderstore onto your server hosted on ValheimServerHosting.com (VSH)

No need to manually update using an SFTP client unlike traditional server providers. VSH takes care of updating your mods on your server through its Mod Manager.

How it works
➤ When you visit a Valheim Thunderstore mod page, VSH checks if the mod is supported and installs it onto the server. This hassle-free, one-click server mod installation is the easiest way to get your mods onto your VSH server.

Install in seconds
➤ Just log in with your VSH account

Help keep our mod manager extension working on all your favorite Valheim Thunderstore pages by emailing our dev team at dev@makisu.co if you run into any trouble.
